title: Fiber Data-Structure
note: A Fiber is work on a Component that needs to be done or was done

title: Tag identifying the type of fiber
note: For example: FunctionalComponent, ClassComponent, Fragment or ContextConsumer

title: Unique identifier of this child
note: Same as what we pass to our components in the props

title: The Fiber to return
note: Usually same as parent of the current component

title: First child of this fiber
note: Pay attention that child value is not an array

title: Next sibling of this fiber
note: This also is not an array

title: Next props of this component
note: It gets updated at the render phase

title: Last props used to render this fiber
note: It gets updated at the end of commit phase

title: Linked list of updates associated with this fiber
note: For example, setState, forceUpdate or an clickEvent fired by browser

title: Last state used to render this fiber
bitField of needed effects
note: For example updating the DOM or calling the componentDidMount

title: linkedList of fibers with EffectTags
note: Needed in the commit phase for traversing only fibers with effects.

title: What makes time slicing work
note: Represents a time in the future by which this work should be completed.

title: Alternate of current fiber
note: It contains updated fiber at the render phase and old fiber after the commit phase
